import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate,useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {Container,Form,Button,Row,Col,Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import {AdminLogin,listUser} from '../action/userActions' import { Alert } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import axios from 'axios' const AdminPanel = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state=>(state.userLogin)) const {loading,error,userInfo} =userLogin const listUser = useSelector(state=>(state.listUser)) const {loading2,userList} = listUser const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listUser()) },[]) const handelLeave = (e) => { const {data} = axios.put('http://localhost:5000/api/admin/evaluateLeave',{index:e.target.value,name:e.target.name}) } return (<>

Admin

{userList.map((obj,i)=>( ))}
# name details
{i+1} {obj.name}
{userInfo.leaves.map((obj,i)=>( ))}
# name Leave for Accept/Reject
{i+1} {obj.user} {obj.date}
) } export default AdminPanel
